item.zeromod.eye_of_chronos.tooltip: "Nah, I would win. You can’t catch me."
item.zeromod.swap_time.tooltip: Right-click to swap your health with the mob!
item.zeromod.cursed_heart.tooltip:
"Evolving Power: Starts off weak but grows stronger with every mob you slay. Unlimited potential awaits... if you survive long enough."

§c⚠ Must be worn as a helmet. Fire resistance won't save you!"
item.zeromod.time_disperser.tooltip: Delay death --- Eat, eat to survive !
item.zeromod.rezero.tooltip:
Return to your death point after 4 seconds

One turn back in time locks all other gates. No one escapes twice in the same moment !
item.zeromod.rezero_eternal.tooltip:
Return to your death point after 4 seconds

One turn back in time locks all other gates. No one escapes twice in the same moment !
